Question: This person sought a rematch in 1976, this time losing by 5,100 votes.
Hints: In March 1989, this person became House Minority Whip in a close election against Edward Rell Madigan.
This person, who won his reelection, was held largely responsible for Republican losses in the House.
This person co-wrote the following alternate history novels and series of novels with William R Forstchen.
